participant_1.background:
I get to work from home, so I can avoid my allergens.
I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is.
i do not want a job.
I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them.
i am a graduate student studying law.

i am short.
since my dog died i m incomplete.

content.text: Hello! I recently got hired as a security guard.
That sounds exciting! I've always wanted to be a barista but I have allergies.
It is alright, I'm short so it was hard to be a barista.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm also short!
Since my dog died I feel incomplete. Do you have any hobbies?
I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I try to avoid my sister-in-law in the morning so that I can focus on my family and business.
I'm close to my family, but we are all very busy.
I'm glad to hear that you have a nice family. I hope we can talk more soon.
